machine_end_gcode.2026-02-25:
;End Gcode for {machine_name}
;Author: Dagoma
M104 S0
M107 ;stop fan
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G92 E0
G1 E-55 F4600
G27
G90 ; Absolute positioning
T0

machine_start_gcode.2026-02-25:
;Start Gcode for {machine_name}
;Author: Dagoma
;Sliced: {date} {time}
;Estimated print time: {print_time}
;Print speed: {speed_print}mm/s
;Layer height: {layer_height}mm
;Wall thickness: {wall_thickness}mm
;Infill density: {infill_sparse_density}%
;Infill pattern: {infill_pattern}
;Support: {support_enable}
;Print temperature: {material_print_temperature}Â°C
;Flow: {material_flow}%
;Retraction amount: {retraction_amount}mm
;Retraction speed: {retraction_retract_speed}mm/s
G90 ;absolute positioning
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0};
M109 S140;
G1 F200 E-1.0
M106 S255 ;Activating layers fans
G28 ;Homing
G29 ;Calibration
M107 ;Off Ventilateur
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ;Temperature for the first layer only
G92 E0 ;Zero the extruded length again
G1 X0 Y-105 Z1 F3000
G1 F{speed_travel}
M117 Printing...
